Package org.taverna.server.master.rest.handler

This package contains type handlers for the RESTful interface to Taverna Server.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessDeniedHandler  
    BadInputPortNameHandler  
    BadPropertyValueHandler  
    BadStateChangeHandler  
    EntryHandler  
    FeedHandler  
    FileConcatenationHandler

    How to write out a File object with JAX-RS.
    FileSegmentHandler
    How to write out a segment of a file with JAX-RS.
    FilesystemAccessHandler  
    GeneralFailureHandler  
    HandlerCore
    Base class for handlers that grants Spring-enabled access to the management model.
    IllegalArgumentHandler  
    ImplementationProblemHandler  
    InputStreamMessageHandler
    Maps a stream from a client into a bounded ordinary input stream that the webapp can work with more easily.
    InvalidCredentialHandler  
    JAXBExceptionHandler  
    NegotiationFailedHandler  
    NoCreateHandler  
    NoCredentialHandler  
    NoDestroyHandler

    NoListenerHandler  
    NotOwnerHandler  
    NoUpdateHandler  
    OverloadedHandler  
    PermissionHandler
    Handler that allows CXF to send and receive permissions as plain text directly.
    Scufl2DocumentHandler
    Handler that allows a .scufl2 document to be read from and written to a REST message directly.
    T2FlowDocumentHandler
    Handler that allows a .t2flow document to be read from and written to a REST message directly.
    UnknownRunHandler  
    URIListHandler
    Deserialization and serialization engine for the "text/uri-list" content type.
    ZipStreamHandler
    How to write a ZIP file as the result entity of a request.

Package org.taverna.server.master.rest.handler Description

This package contains type handlers for the RESTful interface to Taverna Server.
Author:
Donal Fellows
